cast.name: 理查德·劳斯伯格 Richard Roxburgh

this_title: Science of Drugs with Richard Roxburgh Season 1
introduction: From the mind-revealing nature of psychedelics, to the stimulating effects of cocaine – how do active chemicals achieve their effects, where are the main risks, which drugs do the most harm ….and….. are there any benefits?Science of Drugs with Richard Roxburgh is drug science, without the politics. Featuring fascinating interviews with the top international researchers, this is an entertaining, irreverent and in-depth examination of our most common licit and illicit substances, across four one-hour episodes.E1. Legal and LethalE2. Medicinal MindbendersE3. The StimulantsE4. New EpidemicsProduction: [Wildbear Entertainment](https://www.wildbear.tv/work/science-of-drugs-with-richard-roxburgh/)
chinese_title: Science of Drugs with Richard Roxburgh Season 1
